title: check for me
body: im purchase 2800 RB , but im only buy 2 skin total about 1800RB ... where 1000RB ?

replies.body: Since you're having an issue with your RP balance and purchases on the store, I recommend you [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing specialists can look into this for you.
This could also be a visual error with the client. Restarting it usually solves the error.
